name: Rocket (Joseph Weisbecker, 1978)
desc:
The original game that kicked off the CHIP-8 frenzy! In an article in Byte Magazine in 1978 Joseph Weisbecker explains the concept of CHIP-8 and uses this very simple 'game' as the example program. The objective is to launch rockets and hit the alien ship. You score points for each hit.

Launch the rocket with A or B.
